data.text: @NHSEngland @Charles69925305 @GreatOrmondSt unecassary backlogs caused by hysterical overreaction to a cold

@NHSEngland @sajidjavid @GreatOrmondSt It's not a Covid backlog, it's a lockdown & restriction backlog.

A virus didn't create this, the government did with your help.

@NHSEngland @GreatOrmondSt You created millions of backlogs when you shut down departments & life saving checks for a flu strain. 17k dead from CV while millions die year on year from year flu! Reform needed ASAP.

@NHSEngland @sajidjavid @GreatOrmondSt Yet somehow you think this will fix the backlog. Getting staff to work extra hours is not the fix. Any idea when there will be Long Covid clinics for my children?  Dr said Long Covid doesnâ€™t affect children. It absolutely does. You have abandoned people to their Covid fate https://t.co/ayE1p8pa69

@NHSEngland @GreatOrmondSt There's a backlog of NHS patients n almost every ward from cancer screening to treatments all thanks to the poor handling of the pandemic. It now even includes thousands of vaccine injuries too.

@sammons_pamela @NHSEngland @GreatOrmondSt I get it for those small few children and parents affected but people (& NHS) implying there are many is fear mongering and dangerous. They use the word backlog because there's a backlog of all treatments because of the handling of covid including many vaccine injuries.

@NHSEngland @GreatOrmondSt What surgery does covid require because that's news to me. I thought it required drugs and possibly ventilation?

Perhaps you bullshitting about covid again NHS especially wrt children & covid but may I ask why!
@sammons_pamela @NHSEngland @GreatOrmondSt Early treatment actually works. Maybe we should see if we can get that unbanned?

@NHSEngland @GreatOrmondSt Did you know hospitals give CT scans to dead bodies that come in just because they can't say no and to make money off of it... I wonder what else they're trying to make money off of....
